version_description:
Ahoy Kptns! Get ready for our new update! We fixed the step images and added some cool new blogger intros.
Send us your feedback to feedback@kptncook.com

Ahoy Kptns! Get ready for our new update! We fixed bugs and made improvements.
Send us your feedback to feedback@kptncook.com

Ahoy Kptns! Get ready for our new update! We fixed bugs and made improvements.
Send us your feedback to feedback@kptncook.com

Ahoy Kptn! With our new sharing function you can now share your favorite recipes with all your friends! Besides, we added a search function to your favorites in order to find your recipes even faster.
Send us your feedback to feedback@kptncook.com

Ahoy Kptn! With our new sharing function you can now share your favorite recipes with all your friends! Besides, we added a search function to your favorites in order to find your recipes even faster.
Send us your feedback to feedback@kptncook.com

Ahoy Kptn,
now it’s even easier to find your favorite recipe!
Feel like having fish for dinner? Or veggies? Find the perfect recipe with our new filter feature right away!
Send us your feedback to feedback@kptncook.com

Ahoy Kptn,
now it’s even easier to go shopping. Your recipes are also offline available!
Send us your feedback to feedback@kptncook.com

Ahoy Kptn,
small bugfixes, now it’s even easier to go shopping. Your recipes are also offline available!
Send us your feedback to feedback@kptncook.com

Ahoy Kptn,
and welcome to our new look! The new load screen, recipe overview and favorite screens are prettier, clearer and more functional. Thanks to our new tab bar, navigating through the app has also been made easier. Additionally we optimized everything for iPhone X and iOS 11 and fixed small bugs and made changes.
Now cooking is even more fun!
Send us your feedback to feedback@kptncook.com

Ahoy Kptn,
and welcome to our new look! The new load screen, recipe overview and favorite screens are prettier, clearer and more functional. Thanks to our new tab bar, navigating through the app has also been made easier. Additionally we optimized everything for iPhone X and iOS 11 and fixed small bugs and made changes.
Now cooking is even more fun!
Send us your feedback to feedback@kptncook.com

Ahoy Kptn,
and welcome to our new look! The new load screen, recipe overview and favorite screens are prettier, clearer and more functional. Thanks to our new tab bar, navigating through the app has also been made easier. Additionally, we optimized everything for iPhone X and iOS 11 and fixed small bugs and improved the widgets. Also, we altered the sharing function: Now, you can click on a sharing link without the recipe being automatically added to your favorites.
Now cooking is even more fun!
Send us your feedback to feedback@kptncook.com

Ahoy Kptn,
and welcome to our new look! The new load screen, recipe overview and favorite screens are prettier, clearer and more functional. Thanks to our new tab bar, navigating through the app has also been made easier. Additionally, we optimized everything for iPhone X and iOS 11 and fixed small bugs and improved the widgets. Also, we altered the sharing function: Now, you can click on a sharing link without the recipe being automatically added to your favorites.
Now cooking is even more fun!
Send us your feedback to feedback@kptncook.com

Ahoy Kptn,
It was about time for a change.
That’s why we refreshed our design and built in a language switcher that allows you to change the language whilst using the app.
Now, when redeeming a promocode you are now able to share it with your family and friends right after.
Furthermore, you can now add personal notes to your favorite recipes!
Have fun, get cooking and send us your feedback to feedback@kptncook.com

Ahoy Kptn,
It was about time for a change.
That’s why we refreshed our design and built in a language switcher that allows you to change the language whilst using the app.
Now, when redeeming a promocode you are now able to share it with your family and friends right after.
Furthermore, you can now add personal notes to your favorite recipes!
Have fun, get cooking and send us your feedback to feedback@kptncook.com

Ahoy Kptn!
From now on you can you use one of the hottest features of the year! With our new improved filter and sorting function, it’s super easy to find the right dishes for every occasion - Whether low carb, vegan, asian inspired or many more. Try it now!
We welcome any feedback to feedback@kptncook.com

Enjoy browsing!
Your kptns
Ahoy Kptns! The weekend is near and to make it even more enjoyable we are releasing an update with which your app will run even smoother. Enjoy!
Ahoy Kptns! We have made some bugfixes and improvements. Enjoy!
Ahoy Kptns! We have made some bugfixes and improvements. Enjoy!
Ahoy Kptns! We have made some bugfixes and improvements. Enjoy!
Ahoy Kptns! We have made some bugfixes and improvements. Enjoy!

We made Improvements! You have any feedback for us? Write an email to feedback@kptncook.com
We make cooking fun!
Your Kptns

Ahoy Kptns!

Summer has taken its jobs seriously these days but so have we! Today’s update gives you a little foretaste of what’s coming in just a few weeks:

See with the help of small icons which one of your favourites is the most recent of your collection!
Our weekly specials are now impossible to overlook!
Behind the scenes, we also improved the performance in order for your KptnCook app to run smoothly!
Do you have any feedback? Let us know here: feedback@kptncook.com

Hot and happy greetings from your Kptns!
Bugfixes! fixed the facebook login. :-)

Ahoy Kptns!

It’s finally here! We’ve promised you a big update and real Kptns are true to their word!

So from now on, you can save as many recipes as you like!
If you’re signing up as a user now, you’ll get access to unlimited recipe space! No more deleting old favorites to save new ones and no more in-app purchases. If you feel like it, you can save every single recipe – every single day!

Ahoy Kptns!

We are happy to announce a new feature from the KptnCook developer caboose!
We’ve fine-tuned the shopping list so you can purchase recipe ingredients even faster and easier than before.

So what’s new?
- From now on you can combine multiple recipes in a single list - whether from your favorites or the daily recipe ideas
- The total price for all recipes will be displayed - for all of the supermarkets in your area.
- Each ingredient is now pictured, so you can create your shopping list faster

We are looking forward to your feedback!
Please send an email to feedback@kptncook.com

Your Kptns!

Ahoy Kptns, it’s Update Time!

- It’s getting christmassy! With our special snow feature.

- You can now switch between Celsius and Fahrenheit.

- The settings for supermarkets, language, temperature unit and snow now have an extra button in the profile.

- Farewell overcooked pasta! Our useful timer will make cooking with KptnCook even easier.

- You can now browse your favorites for recipe ingredients.

- Performance update to load your favourites even quicker.

We are looking forward to your feedback!
Please send an email to feedback@kptncook.com
Your Kptns!

Ahoy Kptn! You can now add your own products to your shopping list. So not only do you have the recipe ingredients to hand, but also the rest of your groceries too! Easy right?
We are looking forward to your feedback!

Ahoy Kptn! You can now add your own products to your shopping list. So not only do you have the recipe ingredients to hand, but also the rest of your groceries too! Easy right?
We are looking forward to your feedback!

Ahoy Kptn!
You can now add necessities and recipe ingredients to a single shopping list! Easy, right?
Organize your favorite recipes by flagging them with “cooked” or ” I want to cook this”. Keep the cabin clean!
We look forward to your feedback!

Ahoy Kptn!
You can now add necessities and recipe ingredients to a single shopping list! Easy, right?
Organize your favorite recipes by flagging them with “cooked” or ” I want to cook this”. Keep the cabin clean!

We look forward to your feedback!

Ahoy, kptn!
Your much-anticipated iPad version is out now!
The perfect complement to your iPhone app. Be inspired by our recipies on the iPad and do your recipe-shopping with the iPhone. Use all cooking functions and find your saved recipes within the iPad version.
In high resolution you have ingredients and cooking instructions always in view.

Cooking has never been so easy!

We appreciate your feedback!

Ahoy Kptn!
Everyone makes mistakes. Especially when you’re hungry. Don’t worry though, because we got your back with our new update!
You accidentally deleted one of your beloved recipes from your favorites? No problemo! We added a „recently deleted“ list that will show all deleted recipe from the last 30 days. Tap on the recipes you want to restore and they will return to your favorites!

You can also move your favorite recipes from your favorites directly to the shopping cart now. Smooth, right?

Ahoy Kptn!
Everyone makes mistakes. Especially when you’re hungry. Don’t worry though, because we got your back with our new update!
You accidentally deleted one of your beloved recipes from your favorites? No problemo! We added a „recently deleted“ list that will show all deleted recipe from the last 30 days. Tap on the recipes you want to restore and they will return to your favorites!
You can also move your favorite recipes from your favorites directly to the shopping cart now. Smooth, right?

Ahoy Kptn!

A many requested feature is now available: the offline mode!
Now you can cook and shop your favorite recipes even in the remotest places.

In addition, we have fixed some small errors.
- Repaired small bugs when displaying the actionbar in favorites
- Layout improvements on shopping lists and favorites

Now you can continue to enjoy cooking!

Your Kptns!

Ahoy Kptn!

We have an upgrade for your KptnCook profile
From now on you can:

- Upload a personal profile picture
- See how many recipes you have saved and how many you have cooked
- Change your password directly within the profile page

We welcome any feedback to feedback@kptncook.com

Ahoy Kptn!
We have redesigned the profile for you! You can now keep track of how many favorite recipes you've cooked. Plus you can see how often per month you cook and become a real expert in your kitchen.
We could also eliminate a few bugs.
Have fun cooking!
We are always happy to receive your feedback at: feedback@kptncook.com

Ahoy Kptn!
Unfortunately, we have some technical problems on board since the last update. Our developers have been rowing hard to eliminate the bug and hopefully we have succeeded with this version.
Before installing the new update, we advise that you create a free account. This ensures that your favorite recipes are not lost incase you need to reinstall the app.
If you have problems starting the app and still have problems after the update, please contact us at feedback@kptncook.com and we will help you to get your favorite recipes back.
Please stay on board and have a little patience & understanding! We would be sad to lose you as Kptn!

Ahoy Kptn! We have fixed a bug that was mixing up the recipes in your collections.
We are always happy to receive your feedback at: feedback@kptncook.com

Ahoy Kptn,
in this version you will find our brand new widgets that you can use with iOS 14. Quickly access our newest content and don’t miss out on delicious recipes anymore.
We have also fixed a few bugs and optimized the stability.
We are always happy to receive your feedback at: feedback@kptncook.com

Ahoy Kptn! In this version we have chased a few bugs off our ship and cleaned up on deck. We’re also heading for cooler climes and are looking forward to presenting you with delicious autumn recipes.
We are always happy to receive your feedback at: feedback@kptncook.com

Ahoy Kptn!
With this version we have again been able to fix some bugs.
Thanks for your feedback! We always look forward to your suggestions for improving the app. Just write to: feedback@kptncook.com.

Ahoy Kptn! In this version we have chased a few nasty bugs off our ship. Also we have good news for all users who have seen the tutorial many times lately: this bug should be fixed now for good. Happy cooking!
Do you have more input for us? We are always happy to receive your feedback at: feedback@kptncook.com
Ahoy Kptn! In this version we have been able to fix some smaller bugs. We are happy to hear from you if you have more feedback! Just write to feedback@kptncook.com.

Ahoy Kptn! After we've killed some bugs in this version it's finally full speed ahead again
We welcome your feedback anytime at feedback@kptncook.com!
